channel.title: comfort-food Recipes - RSS Feed
channel.description: Fresh comfort-food recipes and cooking inspiration

item.title: French Onion Soup Casserole
item.description: This French Onion Soup Casserole combines the rich, savory flavors of classic French onion soup with the comforting texture of a casserole. Topped with gooey cheese and crusty bread, it's a dish that will warm your heart and satisfy your cravings.
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
⏱️ Prep Time: 15 minutes

🍳 Cook Time: 45 minutes

⏰ Total Time: 60 minutes

🍽️ Servings: 6

📊 Difficulty: Medium

🥘 Ingredients

  • 4 large onions, thinly sliced
  • 4 tablespoons butter
  • 1 teaspoon sugar
  • 4 cups beef broth
  • 1 cup white wine
  • 1 teaspoon thyme
  • Salt and pepper to taste
  • 1 baguette, sliced
  • 2 cups Gruyère cheese, shredded

👩‍🍳 Instructions

  1. In a large skillet, melt butter over medium heat. Add onions and sugar, cooking until caramelized, about 20 minutes.
  2. Stir in beef broth, wine, thyme, salt, and pepper. Simmer for 15 minutes.
  3. Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C).
  4. In a baking dish, layer half of the bread slices, pour half of the onion mixture, and sprinkle with half of the cheese. Repeat layers.
  5. Bake for 20-25 minutes until cheese is bubbly and golden.

📌 Pinterest Tags: #cat1761230594885 #mediumrecipe #1hourmeals #recipe #cooking #foodie #homemade #delicious #large #butter #teaspoon

📌 Save this recipe to Pinterest!

item.title: Southern Sweet Potato Cornbread (Jiffy Hack)
item.description: This Southern Sweet Potato Cornbread is a delightful twist on a classic dish, combining the sweetness of potatoes with the comforting texture of cornbread. Perfect for any meal, it will have your family asking for seconds!
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
⏱️ Prep Time: 15 minutes

🍳 Cook Time: 30 minutes

⏰ Total Time: 45 minutes

🍽️ Servings: 8

📊 Difficulty: Easy

🥘 Ingredients

  • 1 box Jiffy cornbread mix
  • 1 cup mashed sweet potatoes
  • 1/3 cup milk
  • 1 egg
  • 1/4 cup sugar
  • 1/4 cup melted butter

👩‍🍳 Instructions

  1. Preheat your oven to 400°F (200°C).
  2. In a mixing bowl, combine the Jiffy cornbread mix, mashed sweet potatoes, milk, egg, sugar, and melted butter.
  3. Mix until well combined and pour the batter into a greased baking dish.
  4. Bake for 25-30 minutes or until golden brown and a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean.

item.title: Best Make-Ahead Thanksgiving Stuffing
item.description: This make-ahead Thanksgiving stuffing is a savory blend of herbs, bread, and vegetables that will elevate your holiday feast. Prepare it in advance for a stress-free celebration, allowing the flavors to meld beautifully.
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
⏱️ Prep Time: 15 minutes

🍳 Cook Time: 30 minutes

⏰ Total Time: 45 minutes

🍽️ Servings: 8

📊 Difficulty: Medium

🥘 Ingredients

  • 1 loaf of bread, cubed
  • 1 cup celery, chopped
  • 1 cup onion, chopped
  • 1/2 cup butter
  • 2 cups chicken broth
  • 1 tablespoon sage
  • 1 tablespoon thyme
  • Salt and pepper to taste

👩‍🍳 Instructions

  1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
  2. In a large skillet, melt butter over medium heat. Add celery and onion, cooking until softened.
  3. In a large bowl, combine the bread cubes, cooked vegetables, herbs, salt, and pepper.
  4. Pour chicken broth over the mixture, stirring to combine.
  5. Transfer to a greased baking dish and bake for 30 minutes or until golden brown.

item.title: Loaded Crockpot Potato Soup
item.description: Indulge in the creamy goodness of Loaded Crockpot Potato Soup, a comforting dish that warms the soul. Perfectly seasoned and loaded with toppings, this soup is not just a meal; it's a hug in a bowl.
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
⏱️ Prep Time: 15 minutes

🍳 Cook Time: 240 minutes

⏰ Total Time: 255 minutes

🍽️ Servings: 6

📊 Difficulty: Easy

🥘 Ingredients

  • 6 medium potatoes, peeled and diced
  • 1 onion, chopped
  • 4 cups chicken broth
  • 1 cup heavy cream
  • 1 cup shredded cheddar cheese
  • 1/2 cup cooked bacon, crumbled
  • Salt and pepper to taste
  • Chives for garnish

👩‍🍳 Instructions

  1. Place the diced potatoes and chopped onion in the crockpot.
  2. Pour the chicken broth over the vegetables and season with salt and pepper.
  3. Cook on low for 6-8 hours or high for 3-4 hours until the potatoes are tender.
  4. Mash the potatoes slightly with a potato masher for a creamy texture.
  5. Stir in the heavy cream and shredded cheddar cheese until melted and combined.
  6. Serve hot, topped with crumbled bacon and chives.

item.title: Cozy Red Lentil Soup
item.description: Warm up with this cozy red lentil soup that’s packed with flavor and nutrients. Perfect for a comforting meal or a light lunch, this vegan and gluten-free dish can be made in under 30 minutes!
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
⏱️ Prep Time: 15 minutes

🍳 Cook Time: 30 minutes

⏰ Total Time: 45 minutes

🍽️ Servings: 4

📊 Difficulty: Easy

🥘 Ingredients

  • 1 cup red lentils
  • 1 tablespoon olive oil
  • 1 onion, chopped
  • 2 carrots, diced
  • 2 celery stalks, diced
  • 3 cloves garlic, minced
  • 1 teaspoon cumin
  • 1 teaspoon turmeric
  • 4 cups vegetable broth
  • Salt and pepper to taste
  • Fresh parsley for garnish

👩‍🍳 Instructions

  1. Heat olive oil in a large pot over medium heat.
  2. Add onion, carrots, and celery; sauté for about 5 minutes until softened.
  3. Stir in garlic, cumin, and turmeric; cook for another minute until fragrant.
  4. Add red lentils and vegetable broth; bring to a boil.
  5. Reduce heat and simmer for 20 minutes until lentils are tender.
  6. Season with salt and pepper, and garnish with fresh parsley before serving.

📌 Pinterest Tags: #cat1761230594885 #easyrecipe #1hourmeals #recipe #cooking #foodie #homemade #delicious #lentils #tablespoon #onion

📌 Save this recipe to Pinterest!

item.title: Best Creamy Mushroom Soup Recipe Ever
item.description: Indulge in the ultimate comfort with this creamy mushroom soup that warms the soul. Perfect for chilly evenings, this recipe is packed with rich flavors and is surprisingly easy to prepare, making it a must-try for any home cook.
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
⏱️ Prep Time: 15 minutes

🍳 Cook Time: 30 minutes

⏰ Total Time: 45 minutes

🍽️ Servings: 4

📊 Difficulty: Easy

🥘 Ingredients

  • 1 pound mushrooms, sliced
  • 2 tablespoons butter
  • 1 onion, chopped
  • 2 cloves garlic, minced
  • 4 cups vegetable broth
  • 1 cup heavy cream
  • Salt and pepper to taste

👩‍🍳 Instructions

  1. In a large pot, melt butter over medium heat. Add onions and garlic, sauté until translucent.
  2. Add sliced mushrooms and cook until they release their juices and become tender.
  3. Pour in the vegetable broth and bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer for 15 minutes.
  4. Stir in the heavy cream, season with salt and pepper, and blend until smooth.

item.title: The Best Creamy Potato Soup
item.description: Cozy up with a bowl of the creamiest, most comforting potato soup! This easy, homemade recipe is perfect for chilly days and packed with flavor.
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
⏱️ Prep Time: 15 minutes

🍳 Cook Time: 30 minutes

⏰ Total Time: 45 minutes

🍽️ Servings: 4

📊 Difficulty: Easy

🥘 Ingredients

  • 4 large potatoes, peeled and diced
  • 1 onion, chopped
  • 2 cloves garlic, minced
  • 4 cups vegetable broth
  • 1 cup heavy cream
  • 2 tablespoons butter
  • Salt and pepper to taste
  • Optional toppings: shredded cheese, chives, crispy bacon

👩‍🍳 Instructions

  1. In a large pot, melt butter over medium heat. Add onion and garlic, sauté until translucent.
  2. Add diced potatoes and vegetable broth. Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer until potatoes are tender, about 20 minutes.
  3. Use an immersion blender to puree the soup until smooth. Stir in heavy cream and season with salt and pepper.
  4. Serve hot, topped with cheese, chives, or bacon if desired.

item.title: Pioneer Woman White Chicken Chili
item.description: This Pioneer Woman White Chicken Chili is a creamy and flavorful dish that comes together quickly, making it perfect for busy weeknights. With its comforting taste and hearty ingredients, it's sure to become a family favorite.
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
⏱️ Prep Time: 15 minutes

🍳 Cook Time: 35 minutes

⏰ Total Time: 50 minutes

🍽️ Servings: 6

📊 Difficulty: Easy

🥘 Ingredients

  • 1 pound cooked chicken, shredded
  • 2 cans white beans, drained and rinsed
  • 1 can diced green chilies
  • 1 cup chicken broth
  • 1 cup heavy cream
  • 1 teaspoon cumin
  • 1 teaspoon garlic powder
  • Salt and pepper to taste
  • Chopped cilantro for garnish

👩‍🍳 Instructions

  1. In a large pot, combine the shredded chicken, white beans, green chilies, chicken broth, and spices.
  2. Bring to a simmer over medium heat, then stir in the heavy cream.
  3. Cook for an additional 10-15 minutes until heated through, stirring occasionally.
  4. Serve hot, garnished with chopped cilantro.

item.title: Easy White Chicken Chili
item.description: This easy white chicken chili is a warm and comforting dish that comes together in just 40 minutes. Loaded with tender chicken and creamy white beans, it's perfect for cozy dinners and weeknight meals.
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
⏱️ Prep Time: 15 minutes

🍳 Cook Time: 25 minutes

⏰ Total Time: 40 minutes

🍽️ Servings: 6

📊 Difficulty: Easy

🥘 Ingredients

  • 1 pound chicken breast, cooked and shredded
  • 2 cans white beans, drained and rinsed
  • 1 cup corn, frozen or canned
  • 1 onion, diced
  • 2 cloves garlic, minced
  • 2 cups chicken broth
  • 1 teaspoon cumin
  • 1 teaspoon chili powder
  • Salt and pepper to taste
  • 1 cup heavy cream

👩‍🍳 Instructions

  1. In a large pot, sauté onion and garlic until translucent.
  2. Add shredded chicken, white beans, corn, chicken broth, cumin, chili powder, salt, and pepper.
  3. Bring to a simmer and cook for about 20 minutes.
  4. Stir in heavy cream and heat through before serving.

item.title: Creamy Vegan Pumpkin Curry
item.description: Indulge in this creamy vegan pumpkin curry that brings warmth and comfort to your table. Packed with fresh vegetables and spices, it's a delightful dish that is both healthy and satisfying.
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
⏱️ Prep Time: 15 minutes

🍳 Cook Time: 30 minutes

⏰ Total Time: 45 minutes

🍽️ Servings: 4

📊 Difficulty: Medium

🥘 Ingredients

  • 2 cups pumpkin purée (fresh or canned)
  • 1 tablespoon coconut oil
  • 1 onion, chopped
  • 2 cloves garlic, minced
  • 1 tablespoon ginger, grated
  • 1 bell pepper, diced
  • 1 cup spinach
  • 1 can coconut milk
  • 2 teaspoons curry powder
  • 1 teaspoon cumin
  • Salt and pepper to taste

👩‍🍳 Instructions

  1. Heat coconut oil in a large pot over medium heat.
  2. Add chopped onion, garlic, and ginger, and sauté until fragrant.
  3. Stir in the bell pepper and cook for another 3-4 minutes.
  4. Add the pumpkin purée, coconut milk, curry powder, cumin, salt, and pepper, and mix well.
  5. Bring to a simmer and cook for 15-20 minutes, stirring occasionally.
  6. Fold in the spinach just before serving until wilted.

📌 Pinterest Tags: #cat1761230594885 #mediumrecipe #1hourmeals #recipe #cooking #foodie #homemade #delicious #pumpkin #tablespoon #onion

📌 Save this recipe to Pinterest!

item.title: Creamy Smoked Sausage Pasta
item.description: Indulge in this creamy smoked sausage pasta that combines savory flavors and a rich sauce, perfect for a quick weeknight dinner. Ready in just 30 minutes, this dish promises to satisfy your cravings and become a family favorite.
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
⏱️ Prep Time: 15 minutes

🍳 Cook Time: 30 minutes

⏰ Total Time: 45 minutes

🍽️ Servings: 4

📊 Difficulty: Easy

🥘 Ingredients

  • 8 ounces pasta of your choice
  • 1 pound smoked sausage, sliced
  • 1 cup heavy cream
  • 1 cup grated Parmesan cheese
  • 2 tablespoons olive oil
  • Salt and pepper to taste
  • Fresh parsley for garnish

👩‍🍳 Instructions

  1. Cook the pasta according to package instructions until al dente. Drain and set aside.
  2. In a large skillet, heat olive oil over medium heat. Add the sliced smoked sausage and cook until browned, about 5-7 minutes.
  3. Reduce the heat to low and stir in the heavy cream and Parmesan cheese. Mix until the cheese is melted and the sauce is creamy.
  4. Add the cooked pasta to the skillet and toss to coat. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
  5. Serve hot, garnished with fresh parsley.

item.title: Stovetop Creamy Ground Beef Pasta
item.description: Indulge in the ultimate comfort food with this creamy ground beef pasta that comes together in just 30 minutes. It's a delightful blend of tender pasta, rich sauce, and savory beef, perfect for busy weeknights and sure to please the whole family.
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
⏱️ Prep Time: 15 minutes

🍳 Cook Time: 30 minutes

⏰ Total Time: 45 minutes

🍽️ Servings: 4

📊 Difficulty: Easy

🥘 Ingredients

  • 8 ounces pasta of your choice
  • 1 pound ground beef
  • 2 tablespoons olive oil
  • 1 cup heavy cream
  • 1 cup grated Parmesan cheese
  • Salt and pepper to taste
  • Optional: chopped vegetables like bell peppers or spinach

👩‍🍳 Instructions

  1. Cook pasta according to package instructions until al dente, then drain.
  2. In a large skillet, heat olive oil over medium heat and add ground beef, cooking until browned.
  3. Stir in heavy cream and Parmesan cheese, mixing until smooth.
  4. Add cooked pasta to the skillet, tossing to combine and heat through.
  5. Season with salt and pepper, and add any optional vegetables if desired.

item.title: Green Chili Stew With Pork
item.description: This Green Chili Stew with Pork is a hearty, flavorful dish that warms the soul. With tender pork, roasted green chilies, and potatoes, it's a comforting meal perfect for any occasion.
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
⏱️ Prep Time: 15 minutes

🍳 Cook Time: 120 minutes

⏰ Total Time: 135 minutes

🍽️ Servings: 6

📊 Difficulty: Medium

🥘 Ingredients

  • 2 pounds pork shoulder, cut into chunks
  • 4 cups roasted green chilies, chopped
  • 3 medium potatoes, diced
  • 1 onion, chopped
  • 4 cloves garlic, minced
  • 4 cups chicken broth
  • 2 tablespoons olive oil
  • 1 teaspoon cumin
  • Salt and pepper to taste

👩‍🍳 Instructions

  1. Heat olive oil in a large pot over medium heat.
  2. Add the pork chunks and brown on all sides.
  3. Stir in the onion and garlic, cooking until softened.
  4. Add the roasted green chilies, potatoes, cumin, salt, and pepper.
  5. Pour in the chicken broth and bring to a boil.
  6. Reduce heat to low, cover, and simmer for about 1.5 hours, or until the pork is tender.

item.title: Prize-Winning Pumpkin Chili
item.description: Warm up your fall evenings with this prize-winning Pumpkin Chili, a delightful blend of spicy and savory flavors that will make your Halloween dinner unforgettable. Perfect for gatherings, this hearty dish is sure to please everyone at the table.
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
⏱️ Prep Time: 15 minutes

🍳 Cook Time: 30 minutes

⏰ Total Time: 45 minutes

🍽️ Servings: 6

📊 Difficulty: Medium

🥘 Ingredients

  • 1 pound Italian sausage
  • 1 can black beans, drained and rinsed
  • 1 can fire-roasted tomatoes
  • 1 cup pumpkin puree
  • 1 onion, diced
  • 2 cloves garlic, minced
  • 2 tablespoons chili powder
  • 1 teaspoon cumin
  • Salt and pepper to taste
  • 2 cups vegetable broth

👩‍🍳 Instructions

  1. In a large pot, cook the Italian sausage over medium heat until browned.
  2. Add the onion and garlic, cooking until softened.
  3. Stir in the chili powder, cumin, salt, and pepper, cooking for another minute.
  4. Add the black beans, fire-roasted tomatoes, pumpkin puree, and vegetable broth.
  5. Bring to a simmer and cook for 20 minutes, stirring occasionally.

item.title: Best Creamy Mushroom Soup Recipe Ever
item.description: Craving comfort food? This creamy mushroom soup is the ultimate cozy dish, perfect for chilly evenings or a delightful lunch. Packed with flavor and surprisingly easy to make, it's sure to impress!
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
⏱️ Prep Time: 15 minutes

🍳 Cook Time: 30 minutes

⏰ Total Time: 45 minutes

🍽️ Servings: 4

📊 Difficulty: Easy

🥘 Ingredients

  • 1 pound mushrooms, sliced
  • 2 tablespoons butter
  • 1 onion, chopped
  • 2 cloves garlic, minced
  • 4 cups vegetable broth
  • 1 cup heavy cream
  • Salt and pepper to taste
  • Fresh parsley for garnish

👩‍🍳 Instructions

  1. In a large pot, melt butter over medium heat. Add onions and garlic, sauté until translucent.
  2. Add sliced mushrooms and cook until they release their juices, about 5 minutes.
  3. Pour in the vegetable broth and bring to a simmer. Cook for 15 minutes.
  4. Stir in the heavy cream, season with salt and pepper, and blend until smooth.
  5. Serve hot, garnished with fresh parsley.

item.title: Creamy Vegetable Soup
item.description: This Creamy Vegetable Soup is a delightful blend of fresh vegetables and a rich, cheesy base that warms the soul. Perfect for chilly days, it’s a comforting bowl of goodness that everyone will love.
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
⏱️ Prep Time: 15 minutes

🍳 Cook Time: 30 minutes

⏰ Total Time: 45 minutes

🍽️ Servings: 4

📊 Difficulty: Easy

🥘 Ingredients

  • 2 cups mixed vegetables (carrots, peas, corn, etc.)
  • 1 tablespoon olive oil
  • 1 onion, chopped
  • 2 cloves garlic, minced
  • 4 cups vegetable broth
  • 1 cup heavy cream
  • 1 cup shredded cheese (cheddar or your choice)
  • Salt and pepper to taste

👩‍🍳 Instructions

  1. Heat olive oil in a large pot over medium heat. Add chopped onion and minced garlic, sauté until translucent.
  2. Add mixed vegetables and cook for another 5 minutes.
  3. Pour in vegetable broth and bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer for 15 minutes.
  4. Stir in heavy cream and shredded cheese, mixing until melted and creamy. Season with salt and pepper.

item.title: Hobo Casserole Ground Beef
item.description: This Hobo Casserole Ground Beef is a delicious and comforting dish that combines tender potatoes, savory ground beef, and melted cheese, making it a perfect meal for the whole family. It's simple to prepare and packed with flavor, ensuring everyone will come back for seconds!
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
⏱️ Prep Time: 15 minutes

🍳 Cook Time: 50 minutes

⏰ Total Time: 65 minutes

🍽️ Servings: 4

📊 Difficulty: Easy

🥘 Ingredients

  • 1 lb ground beef
  • 1 tablespoon olive oil
  • 1 medium onion, chopped
  • 2 cloves garlic, minced
  • 4-5 medium potatoes, thinly sliced
  • 1 1/2 cups shredded cheddar cheese
  • 1/2 cup grated Parmesan cheese
  • 1 teaspoon dried Italian seasoning
  • 1/2 teaspoon paprika
  • Salt and pepper to taste
  • 1/2 cup beef broth or water
  • 1/4 cup milk (optional, for creaminess)
  • Fresh parsley for garnish (optional)

👩‍🍳 Instructions

  1. Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C) and grease a 9×13-inch baking dish with cooking spray or olive oil.
  2. In a large skillet, heat the olive oil over medium heat.
  3. Add the ground beef and cook, breaking it apart with a spoon, until browned and cooked through (about 5-7 minutes). Drain any excess fat if needed.
  4. Add the chopped onion and minced garlic to the skillet with the beef. Cook for another 3-4 minutes until the onion becomes soft and translucent.
  5. Layer the thinly sliced potatoes on top of the ground beef in the prepared baking dish. First, spread the cooked ground beef mixture evenly in the bottom of the dish.
  6. Then, arrange the potatoes on top, seasoning them with salt, pepper, Italian seasoning, and paprika.
  7. Sprinkle the shredded cheddar and grated Parmesan cheese over the beef.
  8. Pour the beef broth (or water) around the edges of the casserole to keep the potatoes moist while baking. Optionally, drizzle with milk for extra creaminess.
  9. Cover the casserole with aluminum foil and bake for 30 minutes.
  10. After 30 minutes, remove the foil and bake for an additional 15-20 minutes, or until the potatoes are tender and the cheese is bubbly and golden.
  11. Garnish with fresh parsley if desired and serve hot!

📌 Pinterest Tags: #cat1761230594885 #easyrecipe #recipe #cooking #foodie #homemade #delicious #ground #tablespoon #medium

item.title: Hobo Casserole Ground Beef
item.description: This Hobo Casserole is a comforting and hearty dish that combines layers of savory ground beef, tender potatoes, and melted cheese. Perfect for a weeknight dinner, it’s easy to prepare and sure to satisfy the whole family.
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
⏱️ Prep Time: 15 minutes

🍳 Cook Time: 50 minutes

⏰ Total Time: 65 minutes

🍽️ Servings: 4

📊 Difficulty: Easy

🥘 Ingredients

  • 1 pound ground beef
  • 4 medium potatoes, sliced
  • 1 cup shredded cheese
  • 1 onion, chopped
  • 2 cups mixed vegetables
  • 1 can cream of mushroom soup
  • Salt and pepper to taste

👩‍🍳 Instructions

  1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
  2. In a skillet, brown the ground beef and onion over medium heat until fully cooked.
  3. Layer half of the sliced potatoes in a greased casserole dish.
  4. Spread the cooked ground beef mixture over the potatoes.
  5. Add the mixed vegetables on top of the beef.
  6. Spread the remaining potatoes over the vegetables.
  7. Pour the cream of mushroom soup over the top and season with salt and pepper.
  8. Cover with aluminum foil and bake for 40 minutes.
  9. Remove the foil, sprinkle cheese on top, and bake for an additional 10 minutes until the cheese is melted and bubbly.

item.title: Cheesy Hamburger Rice Casserole
item.description: This Cheesy Hamburger Rice Casserole is the ultimate comfort food, combining savory flavors and creamy cheese in a simple dish that everyone will love. Perfect for busy weeknights, it brings warmth and satisfaction to your dinner table.
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
⏱️ Prep Time: 15 minutes

🍳 Cook Time: 30 minutes

⏰ Total Time: 45 minutes

🍽️ Servings: 4

📊 Difficulty: Easy

🥘 Ingredients

  • 1 pound ground beef
  • 2 cups cooked rice
  • 1 cup shredded cheese
  • 1 can cream of mushroom soup
  • 1/2 cup milk

👩‍🍳 Instructions

  1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
  2. In a large skillet, brown the ground beef over medium heat until fully cooked.
  3. In a mixing bowl, combine the cooked rice, cream of mushroom soup, milk, and half of the shredded cheese.
  4. Stir in the cooked ground beef until well mixed.
  5. Transfer the mixture to a greased baking dish and top with the remaining cheese.
  6. Bake in the preheated oven for 25-30 minutes until bubbly and golden.

item.title: Cheesy Hamburger Potato Casserole
item.description: Indulge in this hearty Cheesy Hamburger Potato Casserole, a comforting dish that combines tender potatoes, savory ground beef, and rich cheese for a satisfying meal. Perfect for family dinners or gatherings, this casserole is sure to please everyone at the table.
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
⏱️ Prep Time: 15 minutes

🍳 Cook Time: 75 minutes

⏰ Total Time: 90 minutes

🍽️ Servings: 6

📊 Difficulty: Medium

🥘 Ingredients

  • 3½ lbs potatoes
  • 1 lb ground beef
  • 12 ounces evaporated milk
  • 14 oz can cheese soup
  • ½ cup whole milk
  • 1 yellow onion
  • 8 ounces shredded cheddar
  • 1 tsp salt
  • ½ tsp black pepper

👩‍🍳 Instructions

  1. Preheat the oven to 350°F and grease a 13x9-inch baking dish.
  2. Sauté the ground beef and chopped onion in a skillet until the beef is browned.
  3. Peel the potatoes and cut them into ¼-inch slices.
  4. Arrange a layer of potato slices on the bottom of the prepared baking dish and season with salt and pepper.
  5. Layer the cooked beef and onion mixture over the potatoes, followed by a layer of shredded cheddar cheese.
  6. In a bowl, stir together the evaporated milk, whole milk, and cheese soup until well combined.
  7. Pour the milk mixture over the layers in the baking dish.
  8. Cover the dish with foil and bake for 1 hour.
  9. Uncover and bake for an additional 15 minutes until the top is golden and bubbly.

item.title: Ultimate Cheesy Ground Beef Roll
item.description: Indulge in the comforting warmth of the Ultimate Cheesy Ground Beef Roll, a dish that combines hearty flavors with gooey cheese, perfect for family dinners or as a crowd-pleasing appetizer. This recipe is a modern twist on a classic favorite that will leave everyone asking for seconds.
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
⏱️ Prep Time: 15 minutes

🍳 Cook Time: 30 minutes

⏰ Total Time: 45 minutes

🍽️ Servings: 4

📊 Difficulty: Medium

🥘 Ingredients

  • 1 lb Ground beef
  • 1 tsp Garlic powder
  • 1 tsp Onion powder
  • 1/4 cup Parsley, fresh
  • 1 large Egg
  • 1/4 tsp Black pepper
  • 1 can Crescent roll dough, refrigerated
  • 1 tsp Italian seasoning
  • 1 tsp Paprika
  • 1/2 tsp Salt
  • 1 1/2 cups Cheddar cheese
  • 1 cup Mozzarella cheese

👩‍🍳 Instructions

  1. Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C).
  2. In a large bowl, combine the ground beef, garlic powder, onion powder, parsley, egg, black pepper, Italian seasoning, paprika, and salt. Mix until well combined.
  3. Roll out the crescent roll dough on a baking sheet, pressing the seams together to form a rectangle.
  4. Spread the beef mixture evenly over the dough, then sprinkle the cheddar and mozzarella cheese on top.
  5. Carefully roll the dough from one end to the other, sealing the edges.
  6. Bake in the preheated oven for 25-30 minutes or until golden brown.
  7. Let it cool for a few minutes before slicing and serving.

item.title: Loaded Baked Potato Soup
item.description: Indulge in the creamy, savory goodness of Loaded Baked Potato Soup, a comforting bowl that brings the flavors of a classic baked potato to life. Topped with crispy bacon, melty cheese, and fresh green onions, this soup is perfect for chilly evenings or as a hearty starter for any meal.
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
⏱️ Prep Time: 15 minutes

🍳 Cook Time: 30 minutes

⏰ Total Time: 45 minutes

🍽️ Servings: 4

📊 Difficulty: Medium

🥘 Ingredients

  • 4 large russet potatoes, diced
  • 6 strips bacon
  • 1 cup heavy cream
  • 2 cups chicken broth
  • Cheddar cheese, for topping
  • Sour cream, for topping
  • Green onions, for topping

👩‍🍳 Instructions

  1. Cook bacon in a large pot until crispy, then set aside on paper towels to drain.
  2. In the same pot, sauté the diced potatoes in the bacon fat until slightly softened.
  3. Add chicken broth to the pot and bring to a simmer; cook for about 20 minutes until potatoes are tender.
  4. Mash some of the potatoes in the pot for a thicker texture, then stir in the heavy cream.
  5. Serve hot, topped with crumbled bacon, shredded cheddar cheese, a dollop of sour cream, and sliced green onions.

item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
⏱️ Prep Time: 15 minutes

🍳 Cook Time: 60 minutes

⏰ Total Time: 75 minutes

🍽️ Servings: 4

📊 Difficulty: Medium

🥘 Ingredients

  • 1 kg potatoes, finely sliced
  • 500 ml heavy cream
  • 200 ml milk
  • 2 cloves garlic, minced
  • Nutmeg, to taste
  • Grated Gruyère cheese, for topping

👩‍🍳 Instructions

  1. Preheat your oven to 180°C (350°F).
  2. Finely slice the potatoes and set aside.
  3. Rub a baking dish with minced garlic to infuse flavor.
  4. Layer the sliced potatoes in the dish, alternating with the cream and milk mixture.
  5. Sprinkle nutmeg and top with grated Gruyère cheese.
  6. Bake for 1 hour until golden and bubbly.
